title: SMC_BACKLASH_STARTSTATE (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_BACKLASH_STARTSTATE :
Describes the status of the axis at the time when backlash compensation
module starts.

rows.Name: SMC_BL_START_NEGATIVE
SMC_BL_START_NONE
rows.Comment:
The slave axis is not under traction; a movement in positive or
negative direction will cause a corresponding compensating movement
of distancefBacklash.

rows.Name: SMC_BL_START_POSITIVE
